exceptions.exn: In environment a, b : nat -> R x : R CV_disk_ax : ex_pseries a x CV_disk_bx : ex_pseries b x Unable to unify "exists l : ?V, is_series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n ?M2377 k) (PS_plus ?M2375 ?M2376 k)) l" with "exists l : R_NormedModule, is_series (fun n : nat => Rabs ((fun n0 : nat => plus (a n0) (b n0)) n * Rabs x ^ n)) l".

original: intros CV_disk_ax CV_disk_bx. unfold CV_disk, PS_plus in *. apply CV_disk_le with (Rabs x). - apply Rle_abs. - apply CV_disk_correct in CV_disk_ax. apply CV_disk_correct in CV_disk_bx. apply ex_pseries_plus; auto.
